jsx.ui.event
Interface OnRender

All Known Implementing Classes:
Box, Button, Checkable, Checkbox, Choice, Clickable, Component, Container, Control, DblClickable, Dialog, Div, Draw, Frame, Graphic, Input, Label, Line, Menu, MessageBox, Mouse, Paint, Radio, Resizer, Sketch, Tab, Tree, Uncheckable, Viewport
public interface OnRender

Declares an interface for high level event listeners that handle events of the Render type.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Method Summary
 void onEvent(Render evt)
          Performs an action on the dispatched event.
 

Method Detail

onEvent

void onEvent(Render evt)

Performs an action on the dispatched event.

Parameters:
evt - The event dispatched to this listener.
Since:
1.0
